amendment.description: To express the sense of Congress on damages caused by the regime of Saddam Hussien during the First Gulf War.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2194 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2194 proposed by Senator Bond for Senator Reid to Amendment SA 2150. (consideration: CR S14932-14934) To express the sense of Congress on damages caused by the regime of Saddam Hussien during the First Gulf War.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2194 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2194 proposed by Senator Bond for Senator Reid to Amendment SA 2150.
